  • VR Support: -

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, SteamOS, or any recent Linux distribution
  • Processor: Any basic processor (even single-core)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Works with almost any recent or integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic built-in sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: Uses technology similar to a web browser. Runs well on most Linux systems, including the Steam Deck.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Any basic processor (single-core or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Works with almost any recent or integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic built-in sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: Uses technology similar to a web browser. Runs smoothly even on older or low-performance computers.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 7320U or equivalent (NON-VR)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ 610M or equivalent (NON-VR)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on SteamVR, requires motion controllers. (Tested only with Windows Mixed Reality)
  • Additional Notes: Minimum VR System requirements : CPU - Intel® Core™ i7-7700HQ or equivalent , GPU - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB , RAM - 8GB. Try the DEMO to check how the game runs on your system.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 8540U or equivalent (NON-VR)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ 740M or equivalent (NON-VR)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on SteamVR, requires motion controllers. (Tested only with Windows Mixed Reality)
  • Additional Notes: Recommended VR System requirements : CPU - AMD Ryzen™ 7 1700 or equivalent , GPU - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070ti , RAM - 8GB. Try the DEMO to check how the game runs on your system.
